entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:23 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 6:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -15.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -17.9°C
Wind: ENE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
